name: Chicken Story
description:
INTRODUCTION

Hello Everyone!

We are CyberLab Studios, at our eighth Ludum Dare togheter!

Today we present you Chicken Story, a simple game, well, mostly a collection of little gags, literally almost a walking simulator with only one puzzle, this time we had very little time, but we wanted to partecipate anyway!

GAMEPLAY

Just go along and interact with everything that can be interacted with…

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

E - Interact

Click - Attack

CREDITS

Andrea Di Bartolo 3d Art - 2d Art - Game Design - Announcer Voice

Samuele Padalino  Code - Ui - Game Design

 Music and Sound effects are from [www.zapsplat.com](www.zapsplat.com)
